verses.verse: Then came <WH935> all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to David <WH1732> to Hebron, <WH2275> and spoke, <WH559> saying, <WH559> "Behold, <WH6106> we are your bone and your flesh. <WH1320>

In times past, <WH865> when Saul <WH7586> was king <WH4428> over us, <WH3318> it was you who led out and brought in <WH935> Israel. <WH3478> Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to you, <WH7462> 'You shall be shepherd of my people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> and you shall be prince <WH5057> over Israel. <WH3478>'"

So all the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> to the king <WH4428> to Hebron; <WH2275> and king <WH4428> David <WH1732> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with them in Hebron <WH2275> before <WH6440> Yahweh; <WH3068> and they anointed <WH4886> David <WH1732> king <WH4428> over Israel. <WH3478>
David <WH1732> was thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he began to reign, <WH4427> and he reigned <WH4427> forty <WH705> years. <WH8141>

In Hebron <WH2275> he reigned <WH4427> over Judah <WH3063> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> and six <WH8337> months; <WH2320> and in Jerusalem <WH3389> he reigned <WH4427> thirty-three <WH7970> <WH7969> years <WH8141> over all Israel <WH3478> and Judah. <WH3063>

The king <WH4428> and his men <WH582> went <WH3212> to Jerusalem <WH3389> against the Jebusites, <WH2983> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land, <WH776> who spoke <WH559> to David, <WH1732> saying, <WH559> "Unless you take away <WH5493> the blind <WH5787> and the lame, <WH6455> you shall not come in <WH935> here; <WH559>" thinking, "David <WH1732> can't <WH935> come in here."
Nevertheless David <WH1732> took <WH3920> the stronghold <WH4686> of Zion; <WH6726> the same is the city <WH5892> of David. <WH1732>

David <WH1732> said <WH559> on that day, <WH3117> "Whoever strikes <WH5221> the Jebusites, <WH2983> let him get up <WH5060> to the watercourse, <WH6794> and strike the lame <WH6455> and the blind, <WH5787> who are hated <WH8130> by David <WH1732>'s soul. <WH5315>" Therefore they say, <WH559> "The blind <WH5787> and the lame <WH6455> can't <WH935> come into the house. <WH1004>"

David <WH1732> lived <WH3427> in the stronghold, <WH4686> and called <WH7121> it the city <WH5892> of David. <WH1732> David <WH1732> built <WH1129> around <WH5439> from Millo <WH4407> and inward. <WH1004>
David <WH1732> grew <WH3212> greater <WH1419> and greater; <WH1980> for Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Armies, <WH6635> was with him.

Hiram <WH2438> king <WH4428> of Tyre <WH6865> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to David, <WH1732> and cedar <WH730> trees, <WH6086> and carpenters, <WH2796> and masons; <WH7023> and they built <WH1129> David <WH1732> a house. <WH1004>

David <WH1732> perceived <WH3045> that Yahweh <WH3068> had established <WH3559> him king <WH4428> over Israel, <WH3478> and that he had exalted <WH5375> his kingdom <WH4467> for his people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>'s sake.

David <WH1732> took <WH3947> him more concubines <WH6370> and wives <WH802> out of Jerusalem, <WH3389> after <WH310> he had come <WH935> from Hebron; <WH2275> and there were yet sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323> born <WH3205> to David. <WH1732>
These are the names <WH8034> of those who were born <WH3209> to him in Jerusalem: <WH3389> Shammua, <WH8051> and Shobab, <WH7727> and Nathan, <WH5416> and Solomon, <WH8010>
and Ibhar, <WH2984> and Elishua, <WH474> and Nepheg, <WH5298> and Japhia, <WH3309>
and Elishama, <WH476> and Eliada, <WH450> and Eliphelet. <WH467>

When the Philistines <WH6430> heard <WH8085> that they had anointed <WH4886> David <WH1732> king <WH4428> over Israel, <WH3478> all the Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> to seek <WH1245> David; <WH1732> and David <WH1732> heard <WH8085> of it, <WH3381> and went down to the stronghold. <WH4686>
Now the Philistines <WH6430> had come <WH935> and spread <WH5203> themselves in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim. <WH7497>

David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of Yahweh, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> "Shall I go up <WH5927> against the Philistines? <WH6430> Will you deliver <WH5414> them into my hand? <WH3027>" Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to David, <WH1732> "Go up; <WH5927> for I will certainly <WH5414> deliver <WH5414> the Philistines <WH6430> into your hand. <WH3027>"

David <WH1732> came <WH935> to Baal Perazim, <WH1732> and David struck <WH5221> them there; <WH559> and he said, "Yahweh <WH3068> has broken <WH6555> my enemies <WH341> before <WH6440> me, <WH6556> like the breach of waters. <WH4325>" Therefore he called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of that place Baal Perazim. <WH4725>
They left <WH5800> their images <WH6091> there; <WH1732> and David and his men <WH582> took them away. <WH5375>
The Philistines <WH6430> came up <WH5927> yet again, <WH3254> and spread <WH5203> themselves in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim. <WH7497>

When David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of Yahweh, <WH3068> he said, <WH559> "You shall not go up. <WH5927> Circle <WH5437> around behind <WH310> them, <WH935> and attack them over against <WH4136> the mulberry trees. <WH1057>

It shall be, <WH8085> when you hear the sound <WH6963> of marching <WH6807> in the tops <WH7218> of the mulberry trees, <WH1057> that then you shall stir <WH2782> yourself up; <WH3068> for then Yahweh has gone out <WH3318> before <WH6440> you to strike <WH5221> the army <WH4264> of the Philistines. <WH6430>"
David <WH1732> did so, <WH6213> as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> him, <WH5221> and struck the Philistines <WH6430> from Geba <WH1387> until you come <WH935> to Gezer. <WH1507>
